Happy Birthday Mom!!!

Greetings from Ecuador :D

Mom, you're simply the best. After about a year without you, it still never ceases to amaze me what a powerful, lasting, and meaningful impact you have had and continue to have on my life and so many others. I am so blessed to be your son and hope you enjoy every moment of your extradinarily special day.

Alright here's a joke from your favorite son: Why are computers so smart? Because they listen to their motherboard!!! XD

Have a wonderful day, love Tyler
